plugin.name: google-mail
plugin.description: Send, read, and manage Gmail emails
plugin.context: Use for all Gmail email-related tasks including sending messages, searching conversations, and managing drafts

send_email.description: Compose and send an email message
send_email.usage_context: When user wants to send a new message to specific recipients via Gmail

send_immediately.description: Send email immediately or save as draft

max_recipients.message: Cannot send to more than 50 recipients at once. Please reduce the recipient list.

external_domains.message: This email includes recipients outside your organization. Continue?

no_subject.message: Send email without a subject line?

common_errors.auth_failed: Your Gmail connection has expired. Please go to Settings → Connected Apps to reconnect Gmail.
common_errors.quota_exceeded: You've reached your daily email sending limit. Please try again tomorrow or contact support to increase your limit.
common_errors.invalid_recipient: Some email addresses are invalid. Please verify the email addresses and try again.
common_errors.attachment_too_large: One or more attachments exceed the 25MB limit. Please reduce file sizes or use cloud sharing links.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: Too many requests in a short time. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Gmail permissions are insufficient. Please reconnect with full email sending permissions.

search_emails.description: Search for emails in the user's Gmail account
search_emails.usage_context: When user wants to find specific emails or conversations in their Gmail

query.description: Search query (supports Gmail search operators like 'from:', 'subject:', 'in:', etc.)

max_results.description: Maximum number of emails to return

include_attachments.description: Include and process email attachments in results

max_results.message: Cannot search for more than 100 emails at once.

large_search.message: Search for {max_results} emails? This may take longer to process.

common_errors.auth_failed: Your Gmail connection has expired. Please reconnect in Settings → Connected Apps.
common_errors.invalid_query: The search query format is invalid. Please check your search terms and try again.
common_errors.no_results: No emails found matching your search criteria. Try different keywords or broader search terms.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: Too many search requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Gmail read permissions are insufficient. Please reconnect with full email access.

create_draft.description: Create a draft email without sending
create_draft.usage_context: When user wants to prepare an email for later sending or review via Gmail

common_errors.auth_failed: Your Gmail connection has expired. Please reconnect in Settings → Connected Apps.
common_errors.draft_limit_exceeded: You've reached the maximum number of drafts. Please delete some drafts and try again.
common_errors.invalid_recipient: Some email addresses are invalid. The draft was saved but please verify recipients before sending.
common_errors.api_rate_limit: Too many draft operations. Please wait a moment and try again.
common_errors.insufficient_permissions: Gmail draft permissions are insufficient. Please reconnect with full email access.
